description:
Yuka is struggling with her art homework because she isn`t a good painter. She`s supposed to paint a picture of some fruit, but as Chi-chan is showing her some painting techniques, he eats all the fruit. So he tries to order some more fruit with the PriPri Shot...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: もぎゅっ! フルーツ三人娘でち!
